items.name: Activity overview
items.value: fuse | count() by _path | sort -r

items.name: Unique network connections
items.value: _path=="conn" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_p, id.resp_h | sort | uniq

items.name: Windows network Activity
items.value: fuse | _path mathches smb* OR _path=="dce_rpc" | sort -r _path

items.name: Connection Received Data
items.value: fuse | _path=="conn" | put total_bytes:= orig_bytes + resp_bytes | sort -r total_bytes | cut uid, id, orig_bytes, resp_bytes, total_bytes

items.name: DNS requests
items.value: _path=="dns" | count() by query | sort -r

items.name: HTTP requests
items.value: _path=="http" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, method, host, uri | uniq -c

items.name: HTTP requests_by uri
items.value: _path=="http" | count () by uri | sort -r

items.name: Suricata alerts by category
items.value: event_type=="alert" | count() by alert.severity, alert.category | sort count

items.name: Detected Files
items.value: filename!=null | cut _path, tx_hosts, rx_hosts, conn_uids, mime_type, filename, md5, sha1

items.name: Suricata alerts by src & dst
items.value: event_type=="alert" | alerts := union(alert.category) by src_ip, dest_ip

items.name: Suricata alerts by subnet
items.value: event_type=="alert" | alerts := union(alert.category) by network_of(dest_ip)

items.name: Comunicated hosts
items.value: _path=="conn" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h | sort | uniq

items.name: Frequently comunicated hosts
items.value: _path=="conn" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_p, id.resp_h | sort | uniq -c | sort -r count

items.name: Most active ports (with service)
items.value: _path=="conn" | cut id.resp_p, service | sort | uniq -c | sort -r count

items.name: Most active ports (with src and dst)
items.value: _path=="conn" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, service | sort id.resp_p | uniq -c | sort -r

items.name: Long connections
items.value: _path=="conn" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_p, id.resp_h, duration | sort -r duration

items.name: Transferred data
items.value: _path=="conn" | put total_bytes := orig_bytes + resp_bytes | sort -r total_bytes | cut uid, id, orig_bytes, resp_bytes, total_bytes

items.name: Suspicious hosts
items.value: _path=="dhcp" | cut host_name, domain

items.name: Suspicious IPs
items.value: _path=="conn" | put classnet := network_of(id.resp_h) | cut classnet | count() by classnet | sort -r

items.name: SMB Activity
items.value: _path=="dce_rpc" OR _path=="smb_mapping" OR _path=="smb_files"

items.name: Known Patterns
items.value: event_type=="alert" or _path=="notice" or _path=="signatures"
